attributes.action: Hold a national inquiry into the mishandling of justice for gang rape victims
attributes.additional_details: I believe the British public deserve the truth about the extent of these crimes and that those responsible for covering up are held to account and where necessary punished. The victims and their families deserve nothing less of those paid with public funds to serve them who have instead betrayed them.
attributes.background: Establish a national inquiry into the mishandling of justice for gang rape victims in the past 25 years. Scope to cover local and national Government failures as well as policing failures.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
